document.full_text: yemen's president offered on wednesday to step down by the end of the year in a bid to appease mounting demands for his resignation, but opposition groups showed no sign of easing up on efforts to force him out.
document.title: yemen's saleh offers elections as pressure mounts
lines_and_colors: yemen's president offered on wednesday to step down by the end of the year in a bid to appease mounting demands for his resignation, but opposition groups showed no sign of easing up on efforts to force him out.
